summary: Education/training website offering midbrain activation courses with student application form
architectural_notes: Course catalog with multiple age-appropriate offerings
Course details include duration and daily class hours
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Serene meditation scene with person in lotus position, warm lighting and peaceful atmosphere for meditation course (meditation-course.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Display updated course descriptions with duration details on all frontend course views including public homepage, course list, and student dashboard
Assign a unique image for the new meditation course and display it consistently across all course views

new_feature_requests.summary: Add meditation course for 18+ age group
Add detailed descriptions to all courses (Basic: 3 days/1hr daily, Advance: 15 days/1hr+ daily, Institution: 1 month/1hr+ daily)
Add a new meditation course with age group 18+ to the course catalog
Update Basic Midbrain Activation course description to include duration: 3 days, 1 hour online classes daily
Update Advance Midbrain Activation course description to include duration: 15 days, 1+ hours online classes daily
Update Institution course description to include duration: 1 month, 1+ hours online classes daily
